"Subdue Rheo Madullard":
"In planet Wopal's innermost facility area,
a large Oceanid named Rheo Madullard is
rampaging and causing massive damage.
The damage to the environment and
surrounding area is high as well.
All ARKS please sortie as soon as possible
and subdue the Rheo Madullard.

――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."
